mapper.select: SELECT p.PLACE_NAME,SUBSTR(p.ADDRESS,'1',INSTR(p.ADDRESS,' ',1,1)-1) ADDRESS,p.REGION, t.TAG_ID FROM PLACE p JOIN PLACE_TAGS t ON p.place_id = t.place_id ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE
SELECT c.COURSE_NAME, c.REGION, o.AVG_COST FROM course c JOIN course_order o ON c.COURSE_ID = o.COURSE_ID
